website_summaries.verdict: Shelves are spacious enough for towels and washcloths, and add an organic design touch.
pros: Shelves provide 6-inches of space from front to back
Hangs easily on bathroom walls, creating space while organizing necessities
We love that the shelves are adjustable
cons: We love the natural appearance of bamboo, but it lacks density and can feel delicate to some

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this to match the vanity in my apartment and to give me more space to organize. It's very cute, a little flimsy.. I cant put everything I wanted on it but for hand towels, wash clothes and toilet paper.. it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Lexilex

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and easy to assemble with included screws and hex wrench.be careful to make the two side pieces with the hangers imbedded in them towards the top and the shelves oriented that same way. It’s easy to overlook that detail as the instructions do not point it out. If you have a ratched driver with the correct bit it will go much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great product but hard to put up
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t gotten much use of it yet. The material is very nice. It also goes really well with my bathroom decor BUT OMG it was incredibly difficult to put up. If you don’t measure it exactly (I mean to the mm), it’s not gonna work. I wish they had a paper of where to screw. So you can just put up the paper where you want it and where to insert screws. I had to have a friend help me. Mind you I am proficient with a power drill. I’ve assembled everything else in my apartment with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Ester

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bamboo bathroom shelf is very sturdy and made well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Seaoats22852

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, looks good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a new house with very little bathroom storage, and for $32 this shelf added some easy to install storage. This only attaches to the wall with two screws, so it cannot hold a lot of weight unless you locate wall studs to attach it to. This wasn't a problem for me, as I just use it for some towels, extra TP, and a few small bottles. Make sure you measure carefully before drilling holes for this, as if they're off by 1/8 of an inch you won't be able to attach the shelves to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and utilitarian
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bamboo shelf in my she-bath. I love having my own bathroom from hubby, but it had no storage. Now I have inexpensive, but pretty storage that fits my decor and that I can easily de-personalize when I have guests.
customer_reviews.author: Duffelbagspouse Travels

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Cool Design, Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: It is made of excellent quality bamboo, and it looks great in my bathroom. You can set up the shelves at different heights, which helps with storing bigger things. Also, super easy to install with the provided hardware (plus a drill to make a couple of holes in the wall). Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: Cute little shelves
customer_reviews.text: Great for under the windowsill in the dining room for my plants. Might even get some more for other areas around the house. Comes with everything needed to assemble. One is a little wobbly, but still works well and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Conner

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell but really cute
customer_reviews.text: The anchors it came with were terrible so I used some of my own. The others just put a hole in my wall. It was fine after that and it looked good after I installed it. It also came with a terrible chemical smell. The strongest I've ever smelled on any product, it was really gross. I almost returned it because of the smell. Eventually the smell started to fade so I put it up. It looks really cute though and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kayden Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, sturdy shelf
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this shelf for our bathroom. It doesn't dominate our limited space, but does provide much-needed storage. We had a small mishap with attaching one of the shelves - a joint in the bamboo was unfortunately placed and split as we attached the screw. I think it was just bad luck and is unlikely to happen often! We were able to contact the manufacturer for help and they made everything right very quickly. Our shelf is now just as sturdy and beautiful as it should be! I'm impressed with the smooth feel of the wood and appreciate that there are multiple shelf-height options.
customer_reviews.author: L. Novik

customer_reviews.title: Install wasn't simple, but may be the measurements fault ;)
customer_reviews.text: It is Bamboo! Hubby was concerned with installing the shelving unit in the bathroom where there is steam and moisture. I mentioned it is made with bamboo and he said, ok it can be installed. We had some alignment issues when installing this. We will have to take the wall anchors out, patch the holes and move it a touch to get it fully installed. It is still a work in progress... this box of shelves came with packing paper in another box. Do yourself a favor, lay a packing sheet out flat & mark the alignment before you put the anchors in... and don't let this wife measure... :)
customer_reviews.author: Kiristie Flores

customer_reviews.title: A detailed eye and lots of patience needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dead space between my toilet and the window, it is too small for the regular over toilet shelving. This allowed me to adjust the top shelf to get between the two. Outting it up was a nightmare. If you don't get the measurements EXACTLY right, you'll never get this shelf up. SO.... it took the fitting out, repaired my wall and used the sticky reusable wall hanging stuff. I put 4 sticky pads, (12lb capacity) bingo! Problem solved. I have used thenoriginal fitting type before and wasn't happy with it then either. Other than that, great item, looks great in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Empresss

customer_reviews.title: This is a lovely little shelf.
customer_reviews.text: This shelf unit is solid bamboo, very nicely made and finished. It goes together easily with the supplied hardware, and once assembled the unit is very sturdy. If you are going to put any significant weight on it, you might want to come up with something better than the supplied hanging system. I drilled holes through two of the horizontals and mounted the unit to the wall with long drywall screws going into studs. If you are just using it as a shelf to display trinkets, then the built in hanging system would work fine even with the supplied screws and plastic anchors in drywall.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Screws and anchors don't work
customer_reviews.text: The anchors that come with the screws do not have a lip on them so they pop right into the wall. I'd recommend using different anchors to keep this secure. The piece itself is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: great shelf
customer_reviews.text: looks good in my bathroom, ive had it up for about a year now and its still there. i used 3m adhesives to attach it to the wall and its holding up with lots of items on it, cant complain, no warping or bowing in the wood. solid investment
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: This shelving unit is really nice! Easy to put together, well constructed (all the holes for hardware are perfectly placed & sized), the wood is beautifully colored and finished, and I really like the way the shelves are customizable; I use it on the sill of a bow window to hold African violets and it looks beautiful. It also arrived sooner than expected, which was a nice surprise. I may actually be buying more of these for other areas.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is exactly what I needed for my bathroom. It's large but doesn't stick out too far from the wall. I was concerned about the quality given the low price- absolutely no reason for my worry, it's very stable. Easy assembly too, just 6 screws and the included hex key.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Cute lil shelf
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed it for. Holds my bath products and frees up space around my tub. The wood is a little dark, but that was my mistake. I may paint it.
customer_reviews.author: Tia McCann

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Shelf arrived quickly. Easy to assemble. Loved the different ways to configure and the way it’s assembled you can change configuration later if you want. Well made looks good. It is narrow and will only hold hand towels or wash clothes and small toiletries. So if you are looking for something bigger this is not for you. Works great for my needs. I hung it on wall above toilet and am ordering a second one for the wall behind the door. A+
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: For what you pay and for what it is, this is a true winner. I only rated it four stars for sturdiness, but that's only because you couldn't load these shelves with bricks, but that isn't what you're buying it for is it. The finish is an almost perfect match for the 'honey oak' in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fast assembly, sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have near my tub in order to get all of the hair and body products, bubbles, bath salts, kids toys, etc off the ledges and corners of the tub. It's the perfect size for that spot and has plenty of space for all those things. It was super easy to build and includes the allen wrench thing that the screws need. My only complaint would be the price. This is something that I'd expect to find at Ikea for $15-$20.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Troyer

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Bargain
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for storage for folded tee shirts which I seem to keep accumulating. Not being very good at culling the collection, this seemed like the answer. I bought a pair. Arrived well-packed with concise instructions and everything needed to assemble. They may be a tad narrow to hold XL, XXL tee shirts, but enough to do the job. Well-finished and a nice addition to the wall beside my dresser
customer_reviews.author: pmthomas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two natural color. I received one natural and one dark walnut. Wrong color but I kept it since it is as beautiful as the other. Easy to put together, the predrilled holes all matched well and once assembled, it is very sturdy. They both came with one extra screw for both assembly and mounting. I used sturdier plastic anchors as the only improvement needed. Excellent value overall.
customer_reviews.author: mountain Bill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made, easy to put together and looks fantastic. Product is sturdy and has loads of room. Just what I’ve been looking for to organize my bathroom accessories. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: Sharon F.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted/needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and needed for my master bathroom to give it a few spa-like accents. This shelf is so easy to assemble, but very sturdy. The shelves are also adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf! It was quick to put together and easy to install on the wall. As you can see by the pictures, it holds a lot of stuff. I like that the shelves are wide enough to put my baskets on and help my bathroom look more organized.
customer_reviews.author: Kaity

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised at how much weight it holds up. It's super easy to assemble. I'd definitely advise getting a drill and hammer for the plastic caps though. There's one nail required for the left and right side and one at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks in the picture
customer_reviews.text: The picture is deceiving... this stand is a lot smaller than it looks. Its wide enough to fit toilet paper but no way it will fit towels and decent size baskets... on the plus side, it was easy to assemble and okay for what I needed it for. I wouldn't have spent that much if I knew how small it was
customer_reviews.author: Kayla J

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go in my bathroom and it's perfect. The color is a nice, dark brown and matches my cabinet perfectly. What was surprising was how good the quality is -- I thought it would be nice, but it's better than expected. Perfectly drilled holes, really strong, inset hardware on the shelving system itself to attach to the wall, and a well packed hardware kit with extra screws. Took five minutes to allen wrench the screws into the shelves, which are adjustable. There is a little bit of an odor to the piece, but it will be fine after a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and handy for above the toilet
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice addition to the wall above the toilet. Wasn’t too difficult to put together and I was able to get it on the wall without an electric drill. I don’t have counter space in my “vintage” bathroom so this is perfect. Good size for extra toilet paper, small towels and other bathroom miscellanies.
customer_reviews.author: Kashbee

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the perfect shelf and this is it! It's so lightweight and easy to hang. It looks great and you can change the style outline if you want. It is very sturdy and for $35 you can't go wrong. For more Amazon finds and bargains follow me on IG @miss.d.thrifty
customer_reviews.author: Miss. Thrift

customer_reviews.title: It's good!
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while, but if memory serves me correctly, it was very easy to assemble. Have had it up in the bathroom for almost a year. Still looks great and holding up well. I don't have anything extremely heavy sitting on it, but thus far no issues at all. Still happy with my purchase! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: INLOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a shelf to my plants on for a while now and this one was perfect! It is right over a chair so I didn’t want something too wide, but big enough to hold my pots. It seems really well made, easy to put together, and a great price!! Highly recommend especially for plants.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Perfect for above both of our toilets. Thin enough not to hit your head on when leaning in to turn on the water in the shower. Super cute!! Sturdy and easy to install. Love that you can arrange the shelves in different configurations for your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Well made but a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: Homfa towers we had gotten were very well made and very happy with them. This was to be a shoe rack and it is too narrow really for that on the floor. Mens shoes for sure will not balance well on it. Better as a shelf on the wall I think.
customer_reviews.author: Books,Books,Books

customer_reviews.title: Shelves not that deep
customer_reviews.text: Definitely cannot fit full sized towels on the shelves. Maybe if you roll them but hand towels fit fine. It looks good enough to display candles and baskets and was super easy to build.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together and my dad was nice enough to put it up for me. The shelves are kind of skinny but if you're not putting large baskets, then it's perfect! I just put small items on my shelf and fold the towels small so they fit!
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Shown it can be a floor shelf and it cannot be. Too small.
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this item on Amazon it looked much bigger than it really is. I was planning on setting it on the floor in my kids bathroom but it’s TOO SMALL to really be useful for anything. It’s put together but I am very unhappy with it and have nowhere to put this. I would like to be refunded. Next time please show that it cannot be placed on the floor because it’s NOT that type of shelf. It needs to be hung on the wall and I have no mote room in my bathroom to hang it. Please get back to me. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Mclean

customer_reviews.title: Overall, couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: The shelving isn't very deep, but I was able to fit everything i previously had on a bakers rack in my bathroom and then still have room for more items. Really helps to keep things organized and looks nice too. If put together properly, it seems quite sturdy and is easy to put together really.
customer_reviews.author: mya

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the restroom and used it as a shelf on the floor. It was pretty wide to hang on the wall, but my bathroom is extremely small. I actually ordered - another - one and cut it in half (length wise) so I can have a little height off the floor for toilet paper on top and cleaning products underneath.
customer_reviews.author: christina flores

customer_reviews.title: Annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Mounting was a nightmare. The shelf itself bows a little bit, so it didn’t sit flush on the wall. Then when I went to use the provided wall anchors they slid right into the wall when I was putting the screws in.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: How can I send this item back.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful shelf but won’t stay on the wall. I have a couple heavy items I want to put on it but I’m afraid it will fall off wall and break either my new toilet or crack my new floor tiles. How can I send it back. Thank you. Patricia Klinshaw
customer_reviews.author: patricia klinshaw

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived well packaged and easy to open. It only took me about 15 minutes to put it together and it looks so pretty. Sturdy and a lovely finish. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ravin DeStorm

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected. Well designed and very sturdy. It's only minor flaw is the shelf boards are spaced a bit too much for smaller items like nail clippers, etc to sit on them but for everything else it's fine and a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Verigam

customer_reviews.title: Great size great value
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put together and easy to install. Very sturdy perfect size. This item unfortunately shipped by ups and had a bit of trouble getting this item from them. Amazon is the best it all worked out in the end.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very versitile!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very sturdy. I loaded it with liquid laundry soap and fabric softener containers and it didn't creak or move. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Looks good- wipe clean- narrow shelves
customer_reviews.text: Had to add additional hardware for safety. Nice shelf- easy to assemble and wipe clean. Narrow shelves but do hold hand towels and washcloths well. Bath towels only a few folded to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R

customer_reviews.title: smaller then we thought...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these shelve for our bathroom and notice that the shelves are very narrow and cant really hold our towels or other bathroom supplies. We'll have to find another use for it. Maybe hang it in the garden..really bumped out.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shelves for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into a much smaller house and need more storage for our bathroom items. Unfortunately there is No room in our new bathroom for any additional storage. I saw these shelves and ordered 3. Problem solved. my husband joined two for an extra long area of shelves and one was put on the wall over the toilet. We have access to everything. The shelves are well made and look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Kubazewski

customer_reviews.title: Turned out to be nicer than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf turned out to be much nicer than I expected! It was easy to hang, too. I'd definitely recommend it, especially with the the sustainability factor of bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Arteri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! We live on base & base housing has no space for anything in the bathroom ! This just made my life so much easier. Great quality 👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: What a nice little shelf!! So easy to put together, all the holes lined up, and the instructions were clear. Very sturdy, very nice looking. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Winnafrex

customer_reviews.title: Nice but narrow...
customer_reviews.text: Nice rack for a smaller / guest bathroom. The rack itself is nice and seems to be sturdy enough for a few towels and accessories. However, the rack is narrow so don't expect this to be a full fledged storage rack for larger bath towels. For small spaces it is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Mic_Check

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and hang. Everything, including the allen wrench, included, even a couple extra parts just in case. Quite sturdy, looks nice. Adjustable shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: The shelves itself looks sturdy. Color was like what was shown. Reason I gave it 1 star is because it didn’t come with hardware to assemble it. Only thing it came with was the shelves. I looked EVERYWHERE. Not in box.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy creel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shelf for added space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my adding space for my small bathroom. Was really easy to put together and hang up exactly what I was looking for to add space for extra towels in my main bathroom and to put plants up on top.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley mininger

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my bathroom so far so good. Its sturdy have had no problems. Looks 👍 Update: 2020 product has held up really good would most definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PatNjix

customer_reviews.title: Packed very nice, no scratches
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quick!! Packed very nice, no scratches, and easy to assemble. Fits together very well, and seems to be good material. Looks great onthe wall and even with supplied anchors will hold a lot on the 3 shelves. Should give it a 4 1/2 but no option. Only thing that I do not like is that the screw holes are recessed but nothing to cover as you can see if you really look in the picture. It is pretty basic but look good when items are placed. Over all a good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: David Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow for towels
customer_reviews.text: It’s super easy to out together...but I have no idea how any normal sized towels would fit on the shelves. The picture shows towels but they must super small...definitely should have checked the dimensions
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Figuracion

customer_reviews.title: Easy of installation
customer_reviews.text: It went together easily! Five minutes tops! Mounting took another ten minutes. It is perfect for hand towels extra toilet paper etc... not bulky items like towels.
customer_reviews.author: James L Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Small defect.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the shelf, but there was a small area where the bamboo laminate was peeling away from the frame. Glued and clamped overbite. Hope it lasts in the most environment of the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Selvage

customer_reviews.title: Strong and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and hang, it is very sturdy better quality I thought it would be all doe for the price it should be expected
customer_reviews.author: Dany Ordonez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and really pretty
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture. Great fit for bathroom storage. Nice color. Very easy to assemble and i can't assemble hardly anything.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: not too bad, easy assemble but not easy to install it on the wall
customer_reviews.text: The faterners come with it is of low quality (the expanding tube set), I used my own to successfully install it. The apperacne is nice and reached my expectation but worried about its studiness, as there's only 2 points connected to the wall. But I also assume if the total weight is smaller than 20lbs, it would be safe
customer_reviews.author: SERENA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for plants
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together! Less than 10 minutes. I used mine to hold plants, it seems to be holding everything just fine but the item it’s self is super light.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla145

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little shelf and it looks wonderful. If you need a shelf for a small spot, this one really does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Joan P.

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I have no skills, but managed to install it myself. You only need a tool to insert the screws in the wall. I will purchase another one soon. I have it in my bathroom and it fits three towels. You got to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Bubs

customer_reviews.title: Great for small bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: Works great as an over the toilet shelf to hold light items like toilet paper and hand towels and air freshener
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Nicer than I'd Expected
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is better made and sturdier than I'd expected. Looks great and holds a lot. It didn't take my husband long to have it put together and hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Ida S.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, super cute
customer_reviews.text: Really like this unit! It was super easy to assemble! I was worried the towels would hang over to much, but it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Zee

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of it
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of it. Unfortunately, the screws given were too short and weak. My father in law bumped into it and it ripped out the wall taking pieces of the wall with it:( I want to return this, but can't now. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Caribeth Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Was super easy to put together and hang. I love the way it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf! Great quality great look! It had some awful petroleum smell. But setting it outside for a few days it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: bamboo shelf
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fit perfectly where we installed it. Easy to put assemble, instructions were good.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to add some warm wooden tones to your bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product to spice up your space! It was super easy to assemble and feels so sturdy and durable after installed on the wall. I was looking for something wooden/bamboo to use as storage over the toilet in the bathroom. Really satisfied with this purchase to complete my bathroom renovation!
customer_reviews.author: Su Cappe

customer_reviews.title: Very small and slim!
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy shelf, but smaller than I expected. Looks a little silly on the floor which is what I wanted it for. I’ll have to hang it up.
customer_reviews.author: Batcee

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: Looks better in photo. Not very substantial. Finish imperfect. I will keep it due to return fees so may update this review as I find a use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Housewife

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and holds just about everything you need for easy access.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks great. Attaching it to the wall takes 2 people and a lot of very exact measurements. Once up it's really attractive and great for easy access to whatever you need on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: UrOldLady

customer_reviews.title: Great cd holder
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to hold my husband's cd collection. I bought 2 of these and they are just the right size. They look great on the wall too. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: just what i needed it
customer_reviews.text: the size was just right assembles in 5 mins hangs in no time great product
customer_reviews.author: earl brown

customer_reviews.title: Great bathroom storage
customer_reviews.text: Holds all of my hair care products. Super cute. I love that I am able to store everything and it has easy access. My bathroom is super small, this doesn’t take up too much room over the toilet
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Robinson

customer_reviews.title: yes yes and yes
customer_reviews.text: Loooove! Took me less than 10 minutes to assemble and it looks great! I can wait until it’s mounted and I’ll get to decorate!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Detterline

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It went together very easy. Isn't too heavy dornhaning on the wall and holds a lot of bathroom products.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this shelf
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this shelf. The only issue i had was lining up the screws to secure to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily! Looks nice and neat, and matches my other bamboo decor/items. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my utility room!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my utility room. Put it over my dryer. It looks great and works just like I need it too.
customer_reviews.author: SpyritSeekr

customer_reviews.title: Saves up a lot of space for our bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and seems to be made from good quality. Can hold 3 of our large towel on each tier.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Defected item... bamboo slit
customer_reviews.text: When putting the product together the bamboo split ad would not allow me to tighten the screw. Went through the return process and had to pay 22$ worth of shipping and only got the price of the item back and lost out on the shipping. Would have been a great product if not for the one bad piece that split. Ended up just DIY’ing some shelves myself...

product_meta.title: HOMFA Bamboo Bathroom Shelf 3-Tier Multifunctional Adjustable Layer Rack Wall Mounted Utility Storage Organizer Towel Shelves Kitchen Living Room Holder Natural Color
product_meta.description:
Color:Natural ColorDescription:
★This Homfa Bamboo Rack combines style and functionality to create a modern home furnishing ideal for use in bathroom, living room, kitchen, bedroom or any other space to display and store items.
★It can be used as a storage rack for storing towels, toiletries, shoes, books and other decorative items. This nice bamboo organizer will well match with your furniture in your home.

Features:
✔Stylish and Elegant Design: Made of high grade 100% natural bamboo, healthy and environmental friendly, also bamboo color will make this rack well match with your furniture in your home.
✔Enough space: 3-Tier bamboo rack with suitable height, comfortable for you to take out and put on your clothes or other things, this rack saves space and makes your home neat and well-organized.
✔Safe design: Natural and smooth finish, rounded corners, protect your family from being scratched, especially the children.
✔Convenient for you: Easy to assemble with the hardware, also with the smooth surface, easy to keep clean and maintain.

Specifications:
✿STORAGE RACK SIZE: 23.6"L x 5.9"W x 21.3"H(60cm X 15cm X 54cm)
✿Load capacity: About 6kg per layer(Do not exceed 55lbs/25kg)
✿Material: 100% Natural Bamboo
✿Color: Natural Color
✿Assembly: Easy assembly
✿Tiers: Three

Package Include:
- 1 x Bamboo Wall Shelf
- 1 x Installation instructions 
- 1 x Mounting Accessories inside
feature_bullets: ✿GOOD MATERIAL: Made of 100% natural bamboo Eco-friendly material and some mounting accessories, this storage rack is stable, durable, well made and Eco-friendly.

✿SAFE & EFFICIENT DESIGN: With its smooth surface finish, countersink screws and rounded corners, this shelf will not cause harm to your belongings or your children. And this bamboo rack can be wall mounted or placed on the ground, very convenient and useful.

✿MULTIFUNCTIONAL USE: The bamboo shelf is suitable to be placed in the hall, living room, bedroom, balcony or on the kitchen, bathroom wall. With the 3 tiers bamboo storage shelf you can have enough space to place many your stuffs, such as toiletries, towels, sundries, shoes, books, plants, spice and small appliances, help you organize your home comfortable and tidy.
✿EASY ASSEMBLY: With all the accessories that have been provided, this shelf is easy to assemble and disassembled, and is very space-saving. This rack will be helpful for your neat home or office.
✿STORAGE RACK SIZE: 23.6"L x 5.9"W x 21.3"H(60cm X 15cm X 54cm).
